Articles.Content:
My ame crashes a lot. I think it is because my laptop cant handle the video. Side effect: I end up with piles of extra folders in my game directory. Why not make a crash dumpfolder and put the logfiles in there? Just neater and more organized.

Sidebar: BEST GAME EVER!!!!
I delete my crashdumps regularly (though it happens less often than in the past). All I'm really interested in is the log files, which are available outside the dump.
